settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our products, shipping, and policies

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer:
Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days within the continental US. Express shipping (1-2 days) is available at checkout for an additional fee.

Free shipping is available on all orders over $50!

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer:
We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all products. If you're not completely satisfied, simply return the item within 30 days for a full refund.

Items must be in original condition with tags attached. Shipping costs for returns are the responsibility of the customer unless the item is defective.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer:
Yes! We ship worldwide. International shipping times vary by location:

  • Canada: 7-10 business days
  • Europe: 10-14 business days
  • Asia/Pacific: 12-16 business days
  • Other regions: 14-21 business days

International customers are responsible for any customs fees or import duties.

settings.question: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.answer:
We accept all major payment methods including:

  • Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover
  • PayPal
  • Shop Pay
  • Apple Pay
  • Google Pay

All transactions are encrypted and secure.

settings.question: What's your warranty policy?
settings.answer:
All products come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty covering defects in materials and workmanship.

If you experience any issues, contact us and we'll help resolve it quickly.

settings.question: How do I track my order?
settings.answer:
Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can use this number to track your package on our website or the carrier's website.

If you haven't received a tracking number within 2 business days, please contact us.

settings.question: Can I cancel or modify my order?
settings.answer:
Orders can be cancelled or modified within 2 hours of placement. After that, orders are processed and shipped quickly.

If you need to make changes, contact us immediately at support@oneeko.com or use our live chat.

settings.question: Do you offer wholesale or bulk discounts?
settings.answer:
Yes! We offer special pricing for bulk orders and wholesale customers.

For orders of 50+ units, please contact our wholesale team at wholesale@oneeko.com for custom pricing.
